cards.title: Credit Card
cards.text: Make fast and secure payments using your credit card online.

cards.title: Bank Transfer
cards.text: Easily transfer funds directly from your trusted bank account.

cards.title: QR Code
cards.text: Quickly scan a QR code to complete safe payments.

cards.title: Digital Wallet
cards.text: Pay conveniently with PayPal, Apple Pay, or Google Pay services.
